ussr.robotbuildingblocks
Class RobotDescription

java.lang.Object
  ussr.robotbuildingblocks.Description
      ussr.robotbuildingblocks.RobotDescription

public class RobotDescription
extends Description

A description of the geometry of a complete robot module, including the shape of the core, the shape of a connector, and the positions of the connectors and their range.

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI

Nested Class Summary
static class RobotDescription.ConnectorType
          The connector type used on the robot TODO: support multiple connector types if the need every arises
static class RobotDescription.PhysicsCompositionStructure
          Abstract description of how the robot is assembled TODO: not currently used, remove?
